title: Ticket #1902: Sending reconfig signals to non-daemoncore daemons on windows fails
description: Using condor_reconfig on windows results in signal 1 (SIGHUP) being sent to the daemons condor_master is managing. This is only successful if the daemons are daemoncore daemons. If there is a non-daemoncore daemon being managed by condor_master, then the signalling fails. There should be some means to notify a non-daemoncore daemon to reconfigure.
creator: rrati
